CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 14, 1963, pg. 8 reads: "Homewood-Brushton Civic Club was entertained, charmingly, at a Christmas party, by the president, Mrs. Gilbert (Carmen) Boddy, in handsomely decorated Boddy home, Mulford St. Shown are club members, seated (left to right): Mmes. Ollie Royal, Mary Walker, Carmen Boddy, the hostess; Ollie Finney and Larue Johnson.  Standing: Mmes. Rosalee Johnson, Mary Nesbit, Romaine Moore, Rachel Swain, Susan McCoy, Sophronia Collington, Maud Marshall, Esther Hodges and Georgia Paylor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Homewood-Brushton Civic Club members, seated, from left: Ollie Royal, Mary Walker, Carmen Boddy, Ollie Finney, and Larue Johnson; standing, from left: Rosalee Johnson, Mary Nesbit, Romaine Moore, Rachel Swain, Susan McCoy, Sophronia Collington, Maud Marshall, Esther Hodges, and Georgia Paylor, gathered in home of Carmen Boddy for Christmas party, Mulford Street, another version
